title: "An artificial intelligence probe help see tumor malignancy"
excerpt: "A new study has reported a potassium ion sensitive dual-mode nanoprobe that can achieve non-invasive tumor imaging and malignancy identification via a cascaded ‘AND’ logic gate controlled by inputs of magnetic resonance imaging and fluorescence imaging signals."
